text: 6.9: Sng 118.18; 1 Ko 4.9; 2 Ko 4.2; 4.9-10Mbe nza Zisas farasarigi ŋaara gumgi, mbe nzan kakagi gumgir fara muuŋgi. Nza kaŋgi, mbe gumgir vhɨrvera, mbe nza Zisas farasarigi ŋaara gumgi, mbe nza kaŋgi. Nza vhɨzɨr zav mbui gumgir fara muuŋgi. Nza vhɨzgi fhuvara, nza khar ki. Mbe simtɨgi gu zaagir nza ndɨɨim, nza vhɨzgir zav mbuav, nza vhɨzgi fhuvara.
